message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I'm glad you see the value in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1050000. I'm willing to consider a price of $1080000, which is a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer. Let me know if this is more to your liking.

I understand Alice, thank you for your offer. After careful consideration, I would like to make a counteroffer of $1065000. I hope this proposal is more within your range while still allowing me to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, so I'm proposing a price of $1075000. This is the highest price I'm willing to go, so let me know if this is something you'd like to move forward with.
